paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our team consists of highly experienced attorneys with a proven track record of success in both criminal defense and civil rights cases.

detailsData.title: Top Law Firm Recognition
detailsData.content: Consistently recognized as one of the top law firms in America by U.S. News and World Report for our expertise in civil rights law and criminal defense.

detailsData.title: Client-Focused Approach
detailsData.content: We prioritize our clients' rights and interests, providing dedicated and personalized legal representation for each case we handle.

address: 105 West 'F' St., 4th Floor, San Diego, CA 92101-6087
valueProp: Iredale and Yoo, APC is a boutique firm specializing in high-profile criminal and civil rights cases, providing top-tier legal representation to clients across California and the nation.

testimonalData.text: Iredale and Yoo provided exceptional legal representation for my case. Their dedication and expertise were truly impressive.

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend Iredale and Yoo for anyone in need of skilled criminal defense or civil rights advocacy. They are the best in the business.

testimonalData.text: The team at Iredale and Yoo went above and beyond to secure a favorable outcome for me. I am grateful for their professionalism and commitment.
